name: Naruto - Ultimate Ninja Heroes 2 - The Phantom Fortress [PSP]
description:
Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Heroes 2 - The Phantom Fortress is an arcade-fighting game developed by CyberConnect2 Co.. It was originally released in 2008. Bandai Namco Entertainment published the game.
Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Heroes 2 - The Phantom Fortress is available on PSP.
